name: SARSCoronavirus2IgMQualitativeAndQuantitative
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 IgM, Qualitative and Quantitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to qualitative and quantitative detection of IgM antibodies against SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in serum or plasma.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of IgM antibodies against SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in serum or plasma.),(Exclusion Criteria: )
